name: CHARGE (itch) (HurtTree)
description:
Don't forget to rate my submission!

This is a game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019 with the theme "only one"! 

I didn't have much time for it because I had to work during the jam.

Made everything myself!

Sorry if the gameplay is a little hard for some.

Thank you for playing, I hope you enjoy the game!
